pages.text: A passively cooled Reactor is a Reactor that $(l:bigreactors:reactor/innerworking)generates energy$(/l) directly and that does not use an external medium to dissipate it's internal heat.$(br2)The $(l:bigreactors:intro/first)first Reactor$(/l) described in the early pages of this book is a Reactor operating in Passive Cooling mode.
